name: User attempts to add an valid code and gets network error
description: User attempts to add an valid code and gets network error
descriptionHtml: User attempts to add an valid code and gets network error

testStage.description: User attempts to add an valid code and gets network error

steps.name: I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I skip enrolling for easy pay card
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "DEV TOOLS MOCKS SCREEN" is displayed
I click on "REDEEM CODE PARTNER NA" menu item
I check that the "REDEEM CODE PARTNER NA" is displayed
I toggle the "Get Codes success ✅" switch
I toggle the "Activate Code ✅ or ❌" switch
I click on "SAVE FOR THIS SESSION" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Redeem Code Page" is displayed
I enter the code "500" in the input
I check that the "We’re experiencing internal issue. Please try again or contact Customer Care." toast message is displayed

parameters.name: expectedToastMessageText
parameters.value: We’re experiencing internal issue. Please try again or contact Customer Care.

labels.name: parentSuite
labels.value: GMAP NA Mobile Test Automation - [IOS PARALLEL XML SUITE]
